title: Easy apple muffins
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '125g butter, at room temperature', '200g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '200g (1 to 2) apples, peeled, cored and finely diced']
